S.FORM: Christopher Allport kawas tay 1947, ryax sa tay 17 nqu tay 6, Christopher Allport, squliq na Bunge'. (wal mhuqil sa kawas tay 2008) qyanux nya Alexander Wise Allport Jr htagan beh sa postung. aring 9 kawas hiya ga qyanux na mqwas ru myugi maki New Canaan, (sincyanan)kngnyatiloco. Allport maki Northwestern University hopa pqwasan biru ru Paul Sills msqun mtzywaw. Susan Hayden sliqun squilq Allport.maki sazing mlikuy laqi.
